description: Vadim Black is in charge of organizing his office’s retreat aimed to boost morale. The only thing is he accidentally sent his retreat fantasy to the whole office. Mortified, he decides to hit the bar below the office where he is confronted by coworker, Mike De Marko. Vadim apologizes to Mike but all he wants is to collect on Vadim’s fantasy. Mike sucks on Vadim’s fat cock until he is throbbing and then has his tight hole stuffed and fucked good.
title: Reply All Part 1
